title: Dirty Page behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs to be improved
description: When editing the XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor and then attempting to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed indicating that the changes need to be saved. The user is then required to determine how to save or discard the changes. The dialog is titled 'Error'. The 'Save' option would save the changes, 'Discard' would discard the changes, and 'Cancel' would do nothing and keep the user on the Source page.
OB: When editing the XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor and then trying to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed indicating that the changes need to be saved.
EB: The error message should clearly state that the page is dirty and provide clear options for the user to save or discard the changes.
SR: 1. Open the Layout Editor. 2. Edit the XML in the 'source' view. 3. Attempt to switch back to the Layout view. 4. Observe the error message indicating that changes need to be saved. 5. Ensure that the error message clearly states the page is dirty and provides options to save or discard the changes.
